_header: Here begins a new lesson / Of Christs resurrection
Note: Actually the end of 4970 occurring separately; cf. 442.
_description: The Story of the Resurrection — 501 lines, in couplets

BLRoy17Cxvii.First Lines:
[H]Ere begynnes a new lessounOff crystys
                    ressurreccoun…
BLRoy17Cxvii.Last Lines:
…þat ihesu criste vs grace sendwyt hym to won with outyn
                    ende
BLRoy17Cxvii.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             Three Middle English Religious Poems.
University of Florida Monographs, Humanities
         12 Gainesville, FL, 1963: 19-32.
